values:
A week ago Matt asked me to go out on a Date and that he is wearing a suit on Friday Night!  He said he would pick me up at 6:30.  The date was in honor of our 11 Months being together.

Well Friday Night came and he picked me up looking very hansome in his pinstripe suit with 11 long stem roses. They are gorgeous!

We walk to the car and head towards Hartford, valet parking at Max Downtown (rated top restaurant in Hartford)!  It was great, we go in and they have our reservation.  They seat us at a window overlooking the city.  They serve us Wine and Appetizer on the house, we order Filet Mignon and we dine!  They clear the table and Matt & I sit and talk.  He says I'm babbling a lot tonight, which was true but then he goes into how much he loves me and how much I mean to him.  He says he wants to spend the rest of his life with me.  He stands up and walks over to me, gets down on one knee pops open the ring box and says: 

Will You Marry Me?

I hug him and kiss him and ofcourse say YES!  He puts the ring on my finger, which is gorgeous by the way!  The waiter brings champagne over and says congrats.  The couple next to us takes our first picture as an engaged couple!

Matt sits down and dessert is brought to us, on the house with chocolate spelling Congratulations!  A few minutes later the waiter comes over with a sparkling dessert wine compliments of John & Mark (Matt's bosses).  His bosses know the owner of the restaurant and they helped set up the perfect night, it was all planned and I had no idea!

The evening was amazing!  

On Saturday, Matt had another surpise for me.  We went to Olive Garden and walking in I hear a surprise and Congratulations for us.  He arranged a surpirse party of both his and my family.  Moms, Dads, Grandma, Sisters, Brothers!  It was truly amazing and felt so real, all of our family, 1 big family now!

It was truly a spectacular weekend and I cannot wait to spend my whole life with him!  It was the best surprise of my life!  We are so happy and so in love!  I am so happy I am going to marry my best friend of 4 years.

As for the RING!!!

It is an Elara.  Lux Bond & Green value at $12,500, Elara value at $14,000!  Solid Platinum Band with a 1.1 carat Diamond in a Cathedral Setting with 2 diamonds on the side of the setting.  It is a round cut in a square shape made to relect the most light!! It sure does sparkle, it is perfect just like Matt.

See our Pictures!

Can't wait until Graduation, school is taking a toll on me this year.  For some reason I can't get my act together, no matter how hard I study or work it just isn't working out!!  This summer was great working and living with my love, now I feel I have back tracked!  Oh well, half done with this semester, and next will be extremely easy!! I hope :)

Other than that life is good, Matt is amazing and things are just flowing.  Trying not to think about whats wrong or bad things, just ignoring the bad and living happily.

Halloween tomorrow!! YAY!

Ever feel you are so far gone it doesn't matter anymore?  Going through the motions, keeping up with answers, fighting inside with nothing, not sure where you are headed or what you want.  Knowing you are doing the right thing, on the right path, loving every minute but have nothing in your mind.  You want to curl up cry, fight, laugh, smile, but it all takes to much energy.  Keeping secrets from yourself, not telling yourself who you are or what you want but telling yourself what others want and that is the way to life.  

There is a website where people tell their secrets and no-one knows them.  Take it to your grave!
http://www.postsecret.blogspot.com/

Things are great, actually they are fabulous, but I see nothing inside right now, school is swallowing me and I really just want to choke.  

Everyone is consumed with themselves, saying yes I understand, right, ok and oh shoot really? but who ever really listens to the other?

So My goal is to not work my entire Christmas break .. . .I have 8 day involved Cruise, 5 Day trip to Florida, Don't forget celebrating 1 year with my love, Happy New Year, Merry Christmas, Traveling, Day of errands, Seeing my sister's new house, I figure I'm about down to a week of not knowing what to do, boredom!  I figure if need be I can pick up some extra cash at WCMO if nothing else comes up considering I can make my own hours!  But yeah . . .about 81 days until break!  


Can you tell I'm ready for this year to be over with!?!?!

I just had to get one for my nephew!!

http://abcnews.go.com/Video/playerIndex?id=2462444

It's hilarious!

My Head Itches!

(and no it's not sratchy, it itches)


just incase you were wondering! 




LOL!

So, I guess I am starting livejournal again, This year is devoted to Zac!  I am writing just to occupy him, and he is the only one that leaves comments!  My own boytoy doesn't leave me comments.  I don't even think he reads it!

Anyways my summer was awesome, sad that I am back almost.  The apartment was great, better than, it was fabulous!  (see pictures)  We celebrated both Matt & I's 21st!! (see pictures) Hell yeah! Deja Vu is the place to be.  We also discovered that we are a perfect match . .. maybe the diamond ring isnt to far off! lol  I did my usual, went "down the shore" introduced Matt to WildWood and the mile long hike! It was fun, lost some money at Atlantic City, went to some bars!! All very good things.  Came across the meaning of my life at this moment!  It's all good, It is what it is, I always resort too, but it is good, I meant the man of my dreams, have a good job and hello can we say SENIORITIS!!!

Back at school, living in Park River, other than parking sucking all seems to be good!! 

Welcome back!! Check out my pics!! :)

Life has been looking up lately - 

I got my Internship - TowerRidge Country Club - in adminstration - doing event planning, customer service and handling everything overall! . . .I am the "face of the company" So exciting - the owner seemed a little rough - but who isnt when you are trying to find new employees.

I also am living in CT in a 2 bedroom apartment with Matt - extremely excited!!! We are waiting on our application to go through - but I amdefinitly living up here this summer by all my UHA friends!! lol! (check out my pics - ***our apartment***)

Next - some of my group projects are done - meaning I am a little less stressed!!

Spring Fling coming up - will be fun . . .long islands here I come! :) maybe some margarita's too - just to mix it up!

So in general - stuff is good right now! . . 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

P.S. I saw united 93 (God Bless) - nicely done but really sad - still think it is too soon for the movie . . .but God Bless and thank you for taking the plane down before it's target.

Sometimes it is better to keep quiet but you are that one person that just does not know how too.  I love when you get yourself in trouble, if you do it once it starts a chain reaction and you hit that slump  . . .

2 weeks left!!!  yay!! counting the days . . .

I have 2 interviews this week . . hopefully i won't get my self in trouble . . i want to find an internship up here so I can play house all summer lol and not deal with the trivials of home. :) again 2 weeks left!!!!

some papers some presentations and some exams and then YES folks! I'm DONE with my junior year!!!

:)


sorry to those of you that believe me to be "Cranky" - I'm throughly stressed out and I passed my limits months ago!!!

2 weeks left!!! :)

I feel like there is no need for conversation
Some questions are better left without a reason
And I would rather reveal myself than my situation
Now and then I consider, my hesitation
The more the light shines through me
I pretend to close my eyes
The more the dark consumes me
I pretend I'm burning, burning bright

I wonder if the things I did were just to be different
To spare myself of the constant shame of my existence
And I would surely redeem myself in my desperation
Here and now I'll express, my situation

There's nothing ever wrong but nothing's ever right
Such a cruel contradiction
I know I cross the lines its not easy to define
I'm born to indecision
There's always something new some path I'm supposed to choose
With no particular rhyme or reason

So - I am very sick of school at the moment, believe it or not I am NOT sick of classes or people which usually I am by now!  I am sick of group projects - I have a group project in all of my classes - 6 well actually a group thing in only 5 classes . . but they are so annoying - nobody responds, it is all left to the last minute - I am so frustrated I just want to scream.  Being so frustrated I am very "cranky" - I love warm weather and I'm having a great time but my fuse is very short lately.  Looking at only having 3 weeks left there is a list a mile long of the to-do stuff left!!  But on a good note - we do only have 3 weeks left - still very confused as to where I am living this summer and where my internship - I wish I had someone to say amanda do it this way! lol Life would be a lot easier.  But anyways - everything else in life is good, sitting here in the comp lab bored out of my mind figured I would catch up!  Matt is wonderful; Zac is hiliarious, Missing Shannon, Caitlin is still luckiest person I know, Billy is adorable, Living with Shalane again next year! yay!

I think that's it! 

Happy Easter to those of you that celebrate it!

I love surprises, it took a lot of preparation . .when you are told hey i'm taking you out and I'm wearing a suit . . you never know what to expect, you just know to buy a dress . . .

But it was a fabulous evening, thank you so much . .luv ya!






p.s. driving is better than sex!!!! ~ most of the time . . but there are few occasions! omg is their occasions!!!!! :) lol

So I had an amazing time in Florida . . .it's funny - I have taken 3 boyfriends down there, all have told me they love me and they want to spend the rest of their lives with me . .however 2 of them I could care less about.  I love that I am actually happy, can spend an entire week with someone and not get into one argument and that we both make each other happy its not just me doing it all for him . . .

But anyways . . Florida was awesome . . hot and sunny, bathing suits and flip flops makes for an awesome spring break . . .Not as tan as I would like however it is march so I have more color than a few especially Caitlin . . hahah had to throw that in there! . . .and we have like a month and half of school left and . .oh it's all smiles!!!

Life is good . . .
How come everything in movies are so easy and perfect?

Sometimes I feel life is just USERNAMES & PASSWORDS

USERNAME: Amanda
PASSWORD: *****
Forgot password? 
     Hint: Make me smile

Seriously, tell me one thing you don't need to know the code for or the name for or the way to get in or the way to leave or something to unleash or how to unlock . . .

Days are good when you can wake up and realize

Screw the past - today looks good and my future is on its way.

This weekend was incredible on so many levels - I think because I realized some things - the real things.  Stuff I was still pondering proved me right and I was able to look up and out.  It's all good and for once it is not "it is what it is" but rather I can't wait.

Good friends are great - Best friends are even better.

It's funny how things turn out . . . 

You never know what is in store for you, you have to keep your head up, don't drown in it, survive it. 


"Life moves pretty fast, if you don't stop and look around once in awhile you could miss it." 
~ Ferris Bueller

Ok so - yeah i have had some very bad days lately!

Closet exploded with water - all over clothes shoes sheets towels blankets and other stuff - think about whats in your closet! - SOAKING WET
Bull dozer is taking up 5 spots and i had to park in the faraway lot in 10 degree weather
my partner is being such an . . .UUUHHHHH
a certain family memeber pissed the hell out of me and was totally uncalled for
another family member does things on his own not caring about his own daughters
a certain best friend keeps bugging about whats wrong - get over it i dont want to talk lol
i believe i lost 2 really good freinds from home - whom i really miss and i just have no idea?!?! :(
i may have to move out of my apartment and there is only 2.5 months left
my kindergarten teacher is now giving us pop quizzes bc dumb ass busines students arent able to answer easy questions
attitudes have been flying where i just want to quit bc he can be so egotistical . . . 

and u m the list goes on but that is from sunday night!!!

lol - hope everyone else is doing well! hopefully after i go home this weekend and i come back it will be all good!

on a plus side there are 2 people that keep me laughing and deal with my tantrums!! thanks for the smiles kids!!!

Hearts and roses and kisses galore,
What the hell is all that shit for?
People get mushy and start acting queer, It is definitely the most annoying day of the year.
This day needs to get the hell over with and pass, Before I shove something up Cupid's ass.
I'll spend the day so drunk I can't speak And wear black for the rest of the week.
Guys act all sweet, but soon it will fade, For all they are doing is trying to get laid.
The arrow Cupid shot at me must not have hit, Cause I think this love thing is a crock of shit.
So, here's my story... what else can I say?
Love bites my ass... Fuck Valentines Day!

"It isn't what they say about you, it's what they whisper."

It's funny how things turn out, you can always tell who your true friends are, they are actually honest with you.  What happens when you are honest with them but they aren't in return?  Times change - people change - 

I have grown - wish some others would too.

Are you sick of all those sissy "friendship" poems that always sound
like Hallmark cards, and never come close to reality? Well, here is a
series of promises that really speak to true friendship:

1. When you are sad - I will help you get drunk and plot revenge against
the sorry bastards who made you sad.

2. When you are blue - I will try to dislodge whatever is choking you.

3. When you smile - I will know you've finally had sex.

4. When you are scared - I will rag on you about it every chance I get.

5. When you are worried, I will tell you horrible stories about how much
worse it could be and tell you to quit whining.

6. When you are confused - I will use little words.

7. When you are sick - stay the hell away from me until you are well
again. I don't want whatever you have.

8. When you fall - I will point and laugh at your clumsy ass.


Remember: A good friend will help you move. A really good friend will
help you move a body. Let me know if I need to bring the shovel.

"Life should NOT be a journey to the grave with the intention of arriving safely in an attractive and well preserved body, but rather to skid in sideways, Champagne in one hand - strawberries in the other, body thoroughly used up, totally worn out and screaming WOO HOO - What a Ride!"

The buzzword in today's business world is MARKETING.  However,
>people often ask for a simple explanation of "Marketing."   Well,
>here it is:
>
>You're a woman and you see a handsome guy at a party.  You go up to
>him and say, "I'm fantastic in bed."  That's Direct Marketing.
>
>You're at a party with a bunch of friends and see a handsome guy.
>One of your friends goes up to him and pointing at you says, "She's
>fantastic in bed."  That's Advertising.
>
>You see a handsome guy at a party.  You go up to him and get his
>telephone number.  The next day you call and say, "Hi, I'm fantastic
>in bed."   That's Telemarketing.
>
>You see a guy at a party, you straighten your dress.  You walk up to
>him and pour him a drink.  You say, "May I?" and reach up to
>straighten his tie, brushing your breast lightly against his arm,
>and then say, "By the way, I'm fantastic in bed."  That's Public
>Relations.
>
>You're at a party and see a handsome guy.  He walks up to you and
>says "I hear you're fantastic in bed."  That's Brand Recognition.
>
>You're at a party and see a handsome guy.  He fancies you, but you
>talk him into going home with your friend.  That's Sales.
>
>Your friend can't satisfy him so he calls you. That's Tech Support.
>
>You're on your way to a party when you realize that there could be
>handsome men in all these houses you're passing.  So you climb onto
>the roof of one situated towards the center and shout at the top of
>your lungs, "I'm fantastic in bed!"  That's Junk Mail.
>
>You are at a party, this well-built man walks up to you and gropes
>your breast and grabs your ass. That's the Governor of California!
>
>You like it, but 20 years later your attorney decides you were
>offended.
>That's America!

It's been awhile - hasn't it - I will do a quick catch - up . .  I went to Florida for a week - sat in the sun - swam in the ocean - and tanned beautifully - bragging i know but it was good - however I had a little run-in with the lizards . . I really don't like them, they are worst than the mice - they crawl on the ceiling . . lol . . .however it was warm and this stupid ice storm with the power out and no heat for 3 hours stinks first night back . . but it's all good!

Matt picked me up at the airport - it was really good to see him again - I missed him . . .

Life has been going by - good bad - still going.  I'm anxious to get back to school missing my friends like crazy, Caitlin we need another margarita night like NOW!! lol . . Zac I really need to play some beer pong and kick people's asses . . .lol . . .Shalane I miss ya - we need more laughs . . .Ben - oh ben - we just need some drinks HA! 

and I just miss everyone . . .it's fun times and I'm really sick of Mommy saying "Amanda what are you doing, what time are you going to be home? Amanda be careful blah . . ."

Hope everyone's breaks are going well . . 1 week left!!! :)

So it's 2006 - another year for tears & smiles, regrets & memories, laughs & frowns, love & hate, parents & friends and hopefully a lot more good than bad!

Sometimes you wish you can take back everything, other times it's all good . . and you turn your head and walk away forgetting everything behind you and loving and approaching what's in front of you.

CHEERS to a new year! Let it be a good one - 


New Year's Resolution: To Live it . . . whatever it is . . .and leave behind the pointless.

And who would ever know there was something missing
I guess I didn't see the possibility
It was waiting all the time
But it never crossed my mind

Now all I think about is

You in my life

That I belong with you
Because of you in my world
In my arms
I have everything and now
I can't imagine what I'd do
Without you

Such a curiosity
But what attracted you to me
Was so unexpected

In my life

I can't imagine what I'd do
Without you
Without you  . . . .

Bon Jovi was awesome last night - 50 yrs old and still rockin!!! Old songs new songs - he owns it!!!

Fun times - Jersey Pride - Taylor Ham, Down the Shore and BON JOVI!!!
We did awesome on our presentation! It went so well - I guess I chose the right major!! Done with work until Monday! yay!!! Celebrating with the group tonight!
Take my Quiz on QuizYourFriends.com! Cameron is the immature dork that was mean on my scoreboard!!! lol

Zac is the coolest person - I luv ya . . .

love, UMA

:)

Amazing day today . . . thank you.

 


If only I could figure things out and was able to act on it . .people say I'm aggressive, how come when it comes to this I'm not?

I am so burnt out right now. I can't wait until break.  I've been working my ass off in class, with one exception I think I have all A's or at least high B's . .which is great, but I am so burnt out!

People, work, homework, classes, teachers - I'm done - I want to go home . . 

So this teacher is totally men vs. women which if you know me drives me up the friggin wall . .well I never realized how bad he was until this year because I had him last year he just seemed funny with his jokes well this year there are only 6 people in the class so we all really get to know each other . . which is good because the class doesn't drag however this teacher ignores girls and their opinions he listen's then asks a guy and that's the end of the story . .or my fav he cuts you off to tell you his story . . well ok I'm self-centered too but atleast let me finish . . but anyways today was the last piece . . .lol . . he made fun of my major. .and he was on my turf Auerbach hall he is all hillyer . . .but anyways whatever - I'll make more money than he ever will . .wow I'm a brat . . 

but yeah anyways lets see what else is new besides I'm bored and half to go to a group thing tonight at 730 so I'm wasting time . . 

As always there is some confusion in my life right now with some people . . .not quite sure what to think or feel or do but I think that is why I want break - I am just sick of drama  . . .people getting on my nerves and annoyances and moping and feelings and rudeness and just DRAMA BLEH! . .love you all but still time for a break . . .maybe everything will make sense when I come back and it will just click one way or another . . .

You have a happy life. You probably have your
problems but they don't really affect you. Your
doing good going with the flow..

What Kind Of Life Do You Live? (With Pics)*Updated*
brought to you by Quizilla

When I stand up for myself and my beliefs, they call me a bitch.

When I stand up for those I love, they call me a bitch.

When I speak my mind, think my own thoughts or do things my own way, they call me a bitch.

Being a bitch means I won't compromise what's in my heart. It
means I live my life MY way. It means I won't allow anyone to step on me.

When I refuse to tolerate injustice and speak against it, I am
defined as a bitch.

The same thing happens when I take time for myself instead of being everyone's maid, or when I act a little selfish.
It means I have the courage and strength to allow myself to be who I truly am and won't become anyone else's idea of what they think I "should" be.

I am outspoken, opinionated and determined. I want what I want and there is nothing wrong with that!

So try to stomp on me, try to douse my inner flame, try to squash every ounce of beauty I hold within me. You won't succeed.

And if that makes me a bitch , so be it. I embrace the title and am proud to bear it.

Don't you love when you are so involved in a thought process and you just start thinking and type and just when you are about to hit ENTER you realize it could be the worst moment and thing to do and you click X really quick and call your best friend to say don't let me and get me outta here . . .well what if you do send it? why didn't you? which instinct is right?

"It is better to be a lion for a day, than a sheep all your life"

 You need to live but should it really be controlled by the ENTER key?

ENTER is such a powerful word, key, remark, it opens, its an entrance - its an entrance to mind-boggling emotions . . .

So i'm in my lag time on Monday's - i usually go see Caitlin but it's cold out and I don't have a coat so instead I'm sitting in my lab and talking on AIM express - which sucks by the way!  But anyways - Let's see where do I begin?

Thursday Night was a very fun GUYS NIGHT! we ordered wings and drank beer - it was good, I got to hang out with my favorite UHA boys! 2 I haven't hung out with in awhile so it was lots of fun and definitly a lot of laughs. . . .however the end of the night was odd on so many levels - one friend had a rude awakening - (hugs and kisses it's all good) and we had to do some rescueing . . .and then I got to talk to another about life which was weird but fun . . .

Friday - Not much happened - it was Ben's 21st and we went to dinner- expensive but delicious - drinks and some shots later we wound up back at my place and talked and chilled - favorite quote from that night "You are the best girl driver I've ever been with" YAY - thanks hun!!! Like there was any doubts! lol!!

Saturday I woke up at 630 am to drive home and be at my sisters by 1230 - there was no traffic so it was great however I was exhausted.  I got to play with Billy all day - I miss him so much, and I hung out with my sister cooking and baking and we caught up on everything - that was fun - We celebrated Dad's birthday which was suprisingly relaxful night!

Sunday I picked mom up at the airport and did laundry and went to staples and then drove home well back to school - I took a different route home which made it very enjoyable . . .

well back to reality! Monday day - starts the week . . .

HAPPY 22nd 

BIRTHDAY

ELI!!!

So this entry may seem a little self conceited but hey - its MY live journal! lol and it's supposed to be about me!  And if you didn't care about me then you wouldn't be reading it!  I'm not writing this because I'm sad or even want a response - just at the moment everyone is doing something else and I just don't feel loved.  lol!  So like I said this is going to be conceited!

Lately, I have been getting a lot of attention from different people so I've been pretty happy, I'm a Leo I live for attention - however recently I'm begginning to realize it is negative attention - granted I brought it on myself but still what have I done that makes me so unlovable and just such a bitch!  I don't want to be that girl but hey I am who I am and it usually doesn't bother me but somehow I just don't feel like who I am is a good person.  I liked to be loved for good reasons and not that I'm asking for it because I want it to be true and real but I wish some people would figure out there real emotion towards me, because I'm pretty aggravated by it!

But anyways I don't mean this to be really that self conceited that I'm complaining I'm not loved because I am I just want to be loved by others as well.

P.S. I totally bombed my Marketing Exam - oh well! there isn't much I can do about it! 

How are you?

Sometimes you just need to smile.

You realize there is nothing you can do, your choices are half chance, just like everyone else.  Life can be fabulous or it can be horrible, point is, it is what you make it! So make it with a smile!

whether real or not - it is easier to laugh with a smile and say who cares!

Sometimes you need to look right in front of you and realize what makes you happy are the people listening . . .whether they are laughing because you lit the toaster on fire, or screaming because there is a mouse, or drunk and playing with kermit, or ok amanda have another jello shot or going on late night ice cream runs even though they have work early the next morning or they just hug you because you cant stop crying - they are truly the happy moments of your life!  So you need to smile and say I'm still here and that is what matters and whatever to all the rest!

I always tell people that they need to make themselves happy before seeing happiness with someone else.

Why is it so hard to listen to your own advice? especially when you know you are right!  After having Matt and Caitlin debate my life for me and trying to understand what they are telling me - I'm even more confused.  I'm tired of mixed feelings and emotions, I'm tired of being happy and mad and sad all at the same time, I'm tired of wondering and I'm tired of thinking and I'm especially tired of talking about it, however it's hard not too! But what can I do to change it and if I do change it I don't want to wonder if I chose wrong.

What makes you happy?

In your life, you meet people. Some you never think about again. Some, you wonder what happened to them. There are some that you wonder if they ever think about you. And then there are some you wish you never had to think about again. But you do.

So yeah - on Thursday I learned my lesson the VERY hard way!  Do NOT UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES mix meds and alcohol! it's so bad! lol  But yeah other than that - I need to listen to Matt and Shalane more often - sorry kids! 

And yes - I know I was a bitch too - which that definitly needs to stop! lol
